data.name: Autonomous and electric vehicles deployment in Asia
data.summary:
Join this interactive webinar to learn :

    The regulation of EV/AV deployment in Asia
    Opportunities and challenges in the charging infrastructure
    Public-private partnership towards successful deployment of EV/AV
    New business models to speed up on deployment
data.speakers:
Speakers:
Ng Tiong Say, Operations Director, BlueSG
Lewis Chen, Project Lead, Autonomous Vehicle, Car Club
Punit K Goyal, Co-founder, Blu Smart Mobility

Moderator:
Dhivik Ashok, Principal Chief Executive Officer, Go GreenBOV
